author: ebu
msg: Modified attachment upload form action to use new LinkTag capabilities; action URL now contains page/attachment name, and can be resolved by AttachmentServlet.

author: ebu
msg: Modified upload(): context must be WikiContext.ATTACH in order to correctly resolve the attachment page name being uploaded.

author: ebu
msg: modified figureOutURL() to determine page automatically if not given (use current WikiContext), and to not override context attribute when it's non-empty, non-VIEW -> LinkTag can now provide the correct URL for an attachment upload FORM action (see InfoContent.jsp)
